txt.en: Well-versed in the disciplines of Mounted Combat, you are able to derive greater benefit while riding, regardless of the situation.
In Rohirrim:\nIncreases your War-steed's armour by an additional [placeholder]\n
In Riddermark:\nIncreases your War-steed's Morale by an additional [placeholder]\n
In Red Dawn:\nIncreases damage by an additional [placeholder]
